Translations.Text: Unibuke ubwo twabwiraga abamalayika tuti "Mwubamire Adamu!" Nuko barubama, uretse Ibilisi (Shitani) wabyanze
Nuko turavuga tuti "Yewe Adamu! Mu by’ukuri, uyu ni umwanzi wawe, wowe n’umugore wawe. Bityo, muramenye ntazabakure mu ijuru mutazavaho mukagorwa
Mu by’ukuri, nta nzara uzarigiriramo ndetse nta n’ubwo uzariburiramo icyo kwambara
Kandinta nyota uzarigiriramo ndetse nta n’ubwo uzicwa n’izuba
Nuko shitani imwoshya igira iti "Yewe Adamu! Ese nkurangire igiti (waryaho) ukazabaho iteka ndetse (ukazanagira) ubwami budashira

Nuko bombi (Adamu na Hawa) bakiryaho maze ubwambure bwabo bujya ahagaragara, bityo batangira kubutwikirizaamababi (y’ibiti) byo mu busitani bwo mu Ijuru. Nuko Adamu aba yigometse kuri Nyagasaniwe, maze arayoba
Hanyuma Nyagasani we aramutoranya, yakira ukwicuza kwe aranamuyobora

(Allah) aravuga ati "Nimumanuke mwembi murivemo (mujye ku isi), bamwe bazaba abanzi b’abandi (abantu bazaba abanzi ba Shitani, ndetse na we abe umwanzi wa bo). Kandi umuyoboro wanjye nuramuka ubagezeho, uzakurikira uwo muyoboro wanjye ntazigera ayoba cyangwa ngo agorwe
Ariko uzirengagiza urwibutso rwanjye, mu by’ukuri, azagira ubuzima bw’inzitanendetse no ku munsi w’imperukatuzamuzura ari impumyi
Azavuga ati "Nyagasani wanjye! Ni kuki unzuye ndi impumyi kandi (ku isi) narabonaga
(Allah) azavuga ati "Uko ni ko bigomba kumera, (kuko) ibimenyetso byacu byakugezeho ukabyiyibagiza; nonenawe uyu munsi uribagiranye
Uko ni nako duhana uwarengereye ntiyemere ibimenyetso bya Nyagasani we. Kandi rwose ibihano byo ku munsi w’imperukani byo bikazendetse bizahoraho
Ese ntibibagaragarira ko tworetse ibisekuru byinshi mbere yabo, bakaba banyura mu matongo yabo?Mu by’ukuri, muri ibyo harimo inyigisho ku bantu bafite ubwenge
